TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SmtpErrorCode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration of the possible error codes that may be reported by a .
Docs.remarks: Other than the error, none of the errors require reconnecting to the before continuing to send more messages.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpErrorCode MessageNotAccepted = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The message was not accepted for delivery. This may happen if the server runs out of available disk space.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpErrorCode RecipientNotAccepted = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A recipient's mailbox address was not accepted. Check the property for the particular recipient mailbox that was not acccepted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpErrorCode SenderNotAccepted = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The sender's mailbox address was not accepted. Check the property for the mailbox used as the sender's mailbox address.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Smtp.SmtpErrorCode UnexpectedStatusCode = int32(3)

Docs.summary: An unexpected status code was returned by the server. For more details, the property may provide some additional hints.
